_meta.description: Cross-tradition correspondence map. Use this with hd-gates.json (which has tropicalSignId per gate) to derive full cross-tradition relationships for all 64 gates/gene keys. The 64-gate mappings are computed at runtime via getGateCrossTraditionData().
_meta.source: Stefano — Astrological Alchemy workshops + Kybalion synthesis

aries.theme: Identity — who am I authentically? The self as first relationship.

taurus.theme: Self-worth through resources. Values made material. The body as sacred ground.

gemini.theme: Intellect as creative vitality. Communication, curiosity, and the joy of the mind in motion.

cancer.theme: Ancestral roots, family patterns, the home as inner sanctum. Foundation of all life.

leo.theme: Creative self-expression as soul-purpose. Joy, play, romance — identity crystallized through creation.

virgo.theme: Devotion through refinement. Work and health as sacred practice. Integration through service.

libra.theme: Relationships as the mirror of self. Balance, beauty, justice — integration through the other.

scorpio.theme: Transformation through depth. Sexuality as sacred alchemy. Death/rebirth as the path to authentic voice.

sagittarius.theme: Philosophy and wisdom-seeking. Expansion through higher truth, travel, and spiritual vision.

capricorn.theme: Vocation as spiritual practice. Purpose made visible in the world. Intelligence applied to mastery over time.

aquarius.theme: Collective vision and ideals. The group mind. Humanitarian intelligence — what future does humanity need?

pisces.theme: Dissolution and mysticism. The unconscious as wisdom source. Spiritual depth requiring surrender to speak truth.

1.lifeAreaTheme: Identity, authentic self-expression, how you enter the world
1.stefanoNote: Sun in 1st: Heart chakra activated through self — purpose expressed through pure authentic presence

2.lifeAreaTheme: Resources, self-worth, values, what you own and cherish
2.stefanoNote: Sun in 2nd: Solar Plexus activated through material values — purpose expressed through what you value and build

3.lifeAreaTheme: Communication, learning, siblings, local environment, ideas
3.stefanoNote: Sun in 3rd: Sacral chakra activated through the mind — intellect as the primary creative force and life purpose

4.lifeAreaTheme: Home, family, ancestry, psychological foundations, roots
4.stefanoNote: Sun in 4th: Root chakra activated — solar purpose found in ancestry, home, and creating sacred foundations for self and family

5.lifeAreaTheme: Creativity, self-expression, romance, children, play, joy
5.stefanoNote: Sun in 5th: Sacral chakra activated through creative expression — life force as play, art, love, and delight

6.lifeAreaTheme: Work, health, service, daily routines, refinement
6.stefanoNote: Sun in 6th: Solar Plexus activated through devotion to work and health — mastery through service

7.lifeAreaTheme: Relationships, partnerships, marriage, the significant other
7.stefanoNote: Sun in 7th: Heart chakra activated through relationship — the other as mirror, love as the path to self-knowledge

8.lifeAreaTheme: Transformation, shared resources, sexuality, death/rebirth, occult
8.stefanoNote: Sun in 8th: Throat chakra activated through depth — authentic voice requires going through transformation

9.lifeAreaTheme: Philosophy, higher education, travel, spiritual expansion, beliefs, faith
9.stefanoNote: Sun in 9th: Third Eye activated through wisdom-seeking — purpose fulfilled by expanding into philosophical and spiritual horizons

10.lifeAreaTheme: Vocation, career, public life, authority, highest purpose in the world
10.stefanoNote: Sun in 10th: Crown chakra activated — the solar purpose is cosmic in scale, expressed through vocation and contribution to the world

11.lifeAreaTheme: Groups, friends, ideals, humanitarian vision, collective consciousness
11.stefanoNote: Sun in 11th: Third Eye activated through collective vision — purpose is to hold and embody ideals for the group

12.lifeAreaTheme: Spirituality, solitude, hidden realms, the unconscious, dissolution, karma
12.stefanoNote: Sun in 12th: Throat chakra activated through dissolution — authentic voice requires surrendering to the mystical and the hidden

Sulphur.transformationPath: Raw impulse → directed will → embodied mastery
Sulphur.hermetic: Related to Principles I (Mentalism) and VI (Cause/Effect)

Sal.transformationPath: Experience → integration → wisdom held in form
Sal.hermetic: Related to Principles II (Correspondence) and IV (Polarity)

Mercurius.quality: Expansion, thought, intelligence, connection between worlds
Mercurius.hermetic: Related to Principles III (Vibration), V (Rhythm), and VII (Gender)

root-center.correspondence: Direct — both govern survival pressure, grounding, and adrenal response

spleen-center.correspondence: Intuitive awareness and instinctual knowing — the body's immune and survival intelligence

sacral-center.correspondence: Life force, sexuality, work energy — the core generator frequency

solar-plexus-center.correspondence: Emotional intelligence and wave — the center of feeling awareness

heart-center.correspondence: Willpower, ego, and the drive to prove — personal power center

g-center.correspondence: Identity, love, and direction — the magnetic core of self

throat-center.correspondence: Direct — both govern expression, manifestation of inner into outer form

ajna-center.correspondence: Mental processing and conceptualization — the mind making meaning

head-center.correspondence: Inspiration and mental pressure — the cosmic download center
